attributes.action: suspend the pending new ved tax on 4x4 vehicles in rural areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this country would have ground to a halt in the last fortnight of freezing cold snowy weather if it were not for 4x4 drivers and there good will 
the amount of stories that have been on different radio stations about 4x4 s saving the day has been unprecedented and it is time the government recognizes that they do play an important part instead of trying to tax them off the road
people in rural areas are very dependant on them, we can not all live in the city or in  flat countryside
thankyou for taking the time to read this
